title: INSPIRE Scholarship Program
description: Merit-based scholarship for students pursuing science and technology courses. Covers tuition fees and provides a monthly stipend.

title: Kishore Vaigyanik Protsahan Yojana (KVPY)
description: Fellowship program for students with aptitude for research. Provides financial assistance for higher studies.

title: National Science Olympiad
description: Test your scientific knowledge and compete with students across India.

title: ISRO Summer Internship
description: Work on real space technology projects under expert guidance. Gain hands-on experience in aerospace engineering.

title: JEE Main 2024
description: Joint Entrance Examination for admission to NITs, IIITs and other centrally funded technical institutions.

title: HDFC Parivartan's COVID Crisis Support Scholarship
description: Financial assistance for students whose families have been affected by the COVID crisis. Open to multiple streams.

title: Common Law Admission Test (CLAT)
description: National level entrance exam for admission to undergraduate and postgraduate law programmes in India.
